name: Retni Demo
description:
First game from Lost One Studios. I learned a lot while making this game and I hope that all who play it enjoy.  

- if you are having quality issues try playing in windowed mode
- 'a' and 'd' keys to move 
- press esc key to pause or exit during play
- collect 100 orbs to get an extra life
- blue orbs are worth 10

Please reach out to let me know what you think!
